title: 5 Unexpected benefits of a Plant based diet
summary: The high levels of vitamins, minerals and healthy fats found in a plant-based diet will give you lots of energy, help to improve your complexion, and can help you to lose weight. High levels of iron found in plant foods can help to prevent an iron deficiency, which is common in people with poor diets. Vitamin C in a diet can help prevent wrinkles and fine lines from forming around your eyes, mouth and nose. The high amounts of vitamins and minerals in a vegan diet are very useful for maintaining a healthy weight. They can also lower your cholesterol levels and decrease your risk of developing cardiovascular disease.
